scene_description_enriched: A figure, likely a saint or prophet, stands in profile, facing right. They wear a red robe with gold trim and a grey cloak draped over their shoulders. A patterned hat adorns their head. Their left hand rests on their stomach, while their right hand is raised, holding a book or scroll. A small lamb stands at their feet. The background is a vibrant blue, suggesting a divine or celestial setting, with hints of landscape elements at the bottom.
